name: Riddler Ciphers
description: Complex cryptographic puzzles left by The Riddler as clues for Batman.

content.title: Overview
content.body: The Riddler Ciphers are complex cryptographic puzzles used by The Riddler to challenge Batman. Each cipher offers a clue to further Riddler's elaborate game meant to reveal the corruption in Gotham City.

content.title: Appearance
content.body: The ciphers are typically contained within notes or card-like items, often accompanied by question marks which are The Riddler's signature symbol.

content.title: Function
content.body: These ciphers function as both a puzzle and a tool for communication from The Riddler to Batman, serving to engage the hero in a mental duel and guide him towards unveiling various truths and secrets.

content.title: History
content.body: The Riddler, a brilliant but disturbed criminal mastermind, creates these ciphers as part of his modus operandi to draw Batman into his intricate web of clues and traps.

content.title: Story Significance
content.body: In 'The Batman (2022)', these ciphers play a crucial role, leading Batman through a mystery that uncovers deep-rooted corruption in Gotham and demonstrates The Riddler's influence and reach.
